title: Steve Hansen's loyalty to Kieran Read justified after New Zealand captain reinvents his game to wondrous effect
text:
Among Steve Hansen’s many gifts is a penchant for horse-whispering. Growing up on his family farm outside Dunedin, Hansen learnt how to read the subtlest equine cues for when a horse was in peak form and when it was just about to dip.

That experience has informed much of his coaching career, particularly when it comes to selection. A little under a year ago, the knifes were out for captain Kieran Read following a 16-9 defeat to Ireland capped a year of patchy performances.
